reg_info.act_under: Ontario Municipal Support Grants Act   loi sur les subventions de soutien aux municipalités de l’ontario

content.content: 1. The Association of Municipalities of Ontario is prescribed as a municipality for the purposes of section 2 of the Ontario Municipal Support Grants Act. O. Reg. 452/00, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The Association of Municipalities of Ontario is prescribed as a municipality for the purposes of section 2 of the Ontario Municipal Support Grants Act. O. Reg. 452/00, s. 1.
